text: My posylali kazhdogo poslannika, chtoby vy yemu- s dozvoleniya Allakha - povinovalis'. Litsemery, kotoryye lgut i ne povinuyutsya poslanniku, nespravedlivy k samim sebe. I yesli by te, kotoryye prichinyayut samim sebe nespravedlivost', vernulis' k pryamomu rukovodstvu Allakha i prishli by k tebe (o Mukhammad!), prosya proshcheniya u Allakha za to, chto delali, i ty (o Mukhammad!) poprosil by proshcheniya u Allakha dlya nikh, uvidev, kak oni izmenilis', oni deystvitel'no uvideli by, chto Allakh priyemlet raskayaniye. Ved' On Proshchayushch, Milostiv
